Reviews.Title: Nice backup batteries, etc. for my favorite camera.
Reviews.Author: A. T. Granmommie
Reviews.Content: No problems with any of the items. Great way to backup my camera needs for extended trips or for events that "require" a lot of grandchildren pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: April P "finlefre"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this because the price was great for the batteries I needed and all the other items were a bonus. If you shop around like I do I think you come to the same conclusion and order this. I haven't use everything yet but the batteries work fine.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: wendy boggs
Reviews.Content: It worked for what I needed it for. The battery charger gets used the most. It was a great price and it shipped fast!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jim45056
Reviews.Content: For a penny more, I purchased a bundle which includes some useful stuff in addition to the two batteries.  The tripod is very handy to have.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB 50 in 1 SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement NP-BG1 Battery and Charger Kit + Memory Card Wallet + Multi Card USB Reader + Deluxe Starter Kit for Sony Cybershot DSC-W90, 8.1 Megapixel, 3x Optical/2x Digital Zoom, Digital Camera and Sony NP-BG1
